Description: Maersk Line Limited agreed to pay the government $31.9 million to resolve allegations that it submitted false claims to the United States in connection with contracts to transport cargo in shipping containers to support U.S. troops in Afghanistan and Iraq.

Description: The California Attorney General reached a $1.62 million settlement with owners of cargo terminals at the ports of Long Beach and Los Angeles that required them to pay penalties and help pay for projects designed to reduce their diesel emissions.
